text: François Pérol (born 6 November 1963) is the chairman and CEO of Natixis.François Pérol He graduated from HEC Paris, Sciences Po and ENA.FRANÇOIS PÉROL From 2009 till 2016, he was CEO of Groupe BPCE.Portrait de François Pérol, le patron de BPCE, accusé de prise illégale d'intérêts == References == Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Alumni of HEC Paris Category:French businesspeople Category:People from Saône-et-Loire
title: François Pérol
